E yeu amonesti vos que sobre vos no caia aquo en le qual es esitacio, quar alcunas veguadas cazo deves vos manieyras de homes am manieyras motas de malautias.	And I warn you that this should not happen to you in which there is an accident, for some boils cause you ways of men and methods of diseases.
E de lor es alcu que s’irays am la sua malautia e es leugiera deves lu la mort, e aysso per la vehemensia de aquo que troba de sa malautia, e per longuesa de la malautia de lu, e am la malautia es paor la qual significa mort.	And there is one that will die from their disease and it's easy for them to death, and also due to the violence of what they find with their disease, and due to the longevity of their illness, and fear which means death.
E de aquels es le qual dona a tu son aver e ditta, tu esperant am aquel sanetat, e la sieua malautia es perniciosa.	And those are the ones who give you their advice and say, you hope for that health, and their disease is harmful.
E donc no cove que tu consentas en aquel que ve a vos del qual es aquesta manieyra; e la vostra cautela sia major que covesitat e la vostra rapacitat; e no presumatz alcuna causa sobre aquo sino aprop sciencia certa la qual virifica aquo deves vos, e al qual perve successio lausabla.	And so it goes that you must consent to whoever comes to see you of this manner; and your caution should be greater than trepidation and your appetite; and do not presume any cause upon this but rather a certain science which verifies what you should, and for which there is a plausible succession of success.
E usatz en la curacio de totz vostres malautes de pronosticacio e indicacio de lu al qual es salut convertida, quar en aquel es a vos ajutori sobre adquisicio de fama e de memoria, de lausor e de gloria.	And use in the treatment of all your patients with prediction and indication for which health is converted, that in that there is your aid regarding acquisition of reputation and memory, praise and glory.
O, filhs, Dieus en vos spire le sieu entendement e no oste a vos direccio e proteccio, quar aquo es en la sua ma.	O children, God listens to your understanding and does not withhold direction and protection from you, for that is in his hands.
E yeu e ordenat aquest capitol distingent per capitols segon que precedit en le capitol de cauteris, de la cura del cap entro als pes, per que sia a vos alleujat aquo que demandatz de aquo e del qual havetz necessitat.	And I have arranged this chapter separately by chapters according to the chapter on cautery, on the treatment of the head in relation to the feet, so that you may be comforted with what you are asking for and which is necessary for you.
Capitol primier.	First chapter.
De la curacio de aygua la qual es contenguda en le cap dels enfantz.	On the treatment of water which is contained in the head of children.
Sapias que aquesta malautia motas veguadas endeve als enfantz deves le enfantament e quan la noyrissa estrenh le cap del enfant ses livitat.	Know that this sickness, which appears in children, is due to the onset of puberty and when childhood strength leaves a child's head.
E alcunas veguadas endeve per causa amaguada la qual no es saubuda.	And some bumps due to a hidden cause that is unknown.
Mays yeu no vi aquesta malautia sino en les enfantz; e a totz aquels les quals yeu vi se coytec la mort, e per ayssi es a mi vist layssada obra en aquels.	May I have not seen this illness except in children; and to all those whom I saw died, for which reason it seems to me that the disease is passed on in them.
E yeu e vist que un enfant le cap del qual era d’aygua omplit, e·l cap de lu era totjorn ayssi magnificat entro que ceser no podia sobre si meteys per la grandesa del sieu cap, e mays que la humiditat fe aucmentada entro que foc mort.	And I have seen that a child whose head was filled with water, the size of his head remained always in such a magnificent state that it could not subdue itself due to the size of its head; and more than moisture increased within it causing death.
E aquesta humiditat o es agreguada entre la codena e l’os, o es agreguada dejos le os sobre le ciphac.	And this moisture either accumulates between the bone and the skull, or accumulates from outside on the scalp.
Quar la operacio en aquel si la humiditat es entre la codena e l’os e le apostema es pauc, lahoras cove que tu fendas en le mieg loc del cap am una fissura en la latitut, e sia la longitut de la fissura cays dos notz entro que corra la humiditat, e aquesta es la forma del spatum:	And in that operation if the moisture is between the bone and the skull and there's little pus, then you should make an incision at the midpoint of the head with a fissure in the latitude, and let the length of the fissure be twice the thickness so that the moisture flows out. And this is the form of the spathum:
E donc si la humiditat es mays augmentada e l’apostema es major, lahoras son aqui dos fissuras segon aquesta manieyra:	And thus if the moisture is much increased and the pus is larger, then these are two fissures according to this manner:
E si la humiditat es dejos le os, senhal de lu es que tu vezes la comissuras del cap ubertas de tota partida e l’aygua es spremuda quan tu compremes aquela am la tieua ma a las partidas dedintz e no es aquo a tu amaguat.	And if the moisture is outside of the skull, its sign is that you open all the connections of the head from every side and when you squeeze that inside your hand at those internal parts, water is squeezed out which is not hidden to you.
Cove que tu fendas en le mieg loc del cap am tres fissuras segon aquesta manieyra:	And let there be an incision in the middle of the head with three fissures according to this manner:
e aprop la inscizio extratz ne tota la humiditat; e aprop strenh las fissuras am draps e plumassols; e aprop enbroca aquo de sobre am vi e oli entro al quint dia, e aprop deslia le liament e cura la plagua am tentas e enguentz, e strenh le cap am equalitat; e mange le malaute am vianda secca de pauca humiditat entro que·l membre sia confortat e sanat.	And during the operation extract all the moisture; and strengthen the fissures with bandages and cushions; and on the fifth day apply wine and oil over it, and cleanse the wound with threads and ointment, strengthening the head with equalities; and feed the patient with dry meat of little moisture until the member is comforted and healed.
E es autra manieyra de incisio, que consideras hon apar la magnitut del apostema e la colleccio de l’aygua, quar alcunas veguadas es mays en le occipicii, o en la partida denant, o en la destra, o en la sinistra; e donc aten am la incizio on appar le apostema e la replecio de l’aygua, e fen aquo segon que a tu es miels possible.	And there is another manner of incision that considers the size of the pus and the accumulation of water, for some bumps are more in the back of the head, or at the front, or on the right, or on the left; so attend to where the pus and the water accumulation appear, and do this as best suits you.
Et observa que no inscindas la arteria e endevengua flueys de sanc e mora le malaute per aquel flux de sanc am evacuacio de humiditat.	And observe that do not cut the artery and let the veins of blood and cause the patient to perish from the flow of blood with evacuation of moisture.
Capitol .ii.	Chapter II.
De inscisio de las arterias las quals so aprop las aurelhas, apeladas hilasseysse.	On incision of the arteries which are near the ears, called by the name of veins.
Capitol segon.	Chapter Second.
Quan endeveno ad alcu catars o raumas als huelhs o al pietz, e es antiquat aquo, e no confereys en aquo la curacio de las medicinas, lahoras la deriera curacio en aquest es incizio de aquelas dos arterias.	When it happens to some cold or coughs in the nose or feet and you abandon the treatment with medicines, then the last treatment here is an incision of those two arteries.
E donc cove quan tu vols inscidir aquelas que le malaute raza lo sieu cap, e aprop fregua le loc am drap aspre per so que aparan las arcerias, e aprop sia strengut le col del malaute am alcu drap; e aprop considera on polsa la vena; e les locs de quascuna sobre les locs les quals so aprop las aurelhas depremutz, e tant se occultan sino en alcus homes.	And let there be an incision when you want to cut the part of the patient that rises from his head, and rub the place with a coarse cloth so that the arteries appear, and let the neck of the patient be strengthened with a few cloths; and consider where the pulse beats; and the places below those which are near the ears depress, and they do not always hide in such people.
E aprop senha sobre la arceria am tenta, e aprop inscideys quascuna am le spatum de quascuna partida agut am inscizio pervenient entro al os, e sia aquo per la latitut del cap.	And press on the artery with a thread, and make an incision in each at the edge of the sharp part near the incision entering into the skull, and let this be according to the size of the head.
E si vols, entromet le spatum dejos la arteria e trenqua aquala a las inciden a las partidas desus.	And if you want, place the spatula under the artery and twist that which meets them at the parts above.
E sia la longitut de la inscizio cays dos ditz ajustatz, quar quan alcuna vena es inscizida le sanc es eyssit am egressio pulsatil, le qual saut deforo per saut frequent.	And let the length of the incision be twice the thickness adjusted, for when any vein is incised blood stops at its exit pulsating which frequently jumps over.
Mays si la arceria no apareys al cintiment, lahoras cove que tu mesures de la aurelha la quantitat del spazi de tres ditz, e aprop senha am tenta, e fen entro al os.	May if the artery does not appear in the center, then let there be measured from the ear the quantity of space three inches, and press with a thread, and make an incision into the skull.
E aquo que cove getar del sanc es quantitat de vi unc., e fort leu ne geta de lu mays o mens, e tot aquo es segon la quantitat la qual appareys de la vertut del malaute e de la replecio de la arceria de lu.	And whatever comes out of the blood is a quantity of wine one ounce. And strengthen the patient with more or less, and all this is according to the quantity which appears from the virtue of the patient and the filling of the artery of him.
E aprop considera la plagua, e donc si reman sobre le os alcuna causa del ciphac, lahoras inscindys aquo per so que no endevengua apostema caut.	And let there be an examination of the wound, and thus if there remains over the skull any cause of the scalp, then cut that to avoid pus formation.
E aprop strenh la plagua am plumassols e am liamentz de drap de li, e aprop cura aquela am enguentz entro que sia sanat.	And then strengthen the wound with plasters and with lint from linen, and then treat that with ointment inside so that it is healed.
Capitol .iii.	Chapter III.
De extraccio de las arcerias las quals so en las templas.	On the extraction of the nerves which are in the temples.
Quan ad alcu accideys emigranea antiqua o catertz agutz, per humiditatz agrimonials e per qualiditat en les lacertz des templas, o sodo antiqua vehement e semblantz ad aquels, e es medicat am las manieyras de curacio de medicina e aquo no comfereys, lahoras nos hem sproatz en aquestas malautias extraccio de las arcerias en les templas, o cauterizacio de aquelas ayssi cum havem mostrat.	When it happens that old migraines or intense headaches occur due to humidity and quality in the nerves of the temples, or ancient headache becomes strong resembling those, and is treated according to the methods of healing medicine, if this does not relieve, then we have developed these illnesses: extraction of the nerves in the temples, or cauterization of those as we have shown.
E la manieyra de la operacio e extracio de aquelas es que·l malaute raza les pels les quals son en les templas; e entenda a la arceria apparent en le templar quar ela es a tu mostrada per le sieu pols, e·s occultada sino en paucs homes per vehemencia de freg.	The method of the operation and extraction is like this: the patient raises their skin which is in the temples; and recognize the nerve that seems to be in the temple area according to its position, it's hidden in few people due to the intensity of rubbing.
E si a tu es occultada, lahoras le col del malaute sia strengut am alcun drap; e aprop fregua le loc am un drap aspre o evapora le loc am aygua cauda entro que aparesca a tu la arceria manifestament.	And if it is hidden, then you have the patient hold onto their head with some fabric; and then rub the area with a rough cloth or heat up water and pour it on that spot until the nerve becomes clearly visible.
E lahoras tu pren le spatum del qual aquesta es la forma:	And then you take the needle of which this is the shape:
E aprop tu scorja la codena am aquel am facilitat entro que pervenguas a la arceria; e aprop geta en lu onti e extratz aquela a las partidas sobiranas entro que extraguas aquela de la codena e descobras aquela de las tunicas las quals so dejos aquela, de tota partida.	And then you ignite the thread while making it easy to pass through until you reach the nerve; and then heat oil and extract that in the upper parts; after extracting that from the thread, uncover those of the tunics which are under that, in all parts.
Mays si la arteria es subtil, lahoras envolveys aquela am la extremitat del oncii, e aprop inscindeys de aquela una partida segon la quantitat per la qual sian alonguadas las extremitatz de lu e sian contraytas, e no endevindra flux de sanc, quar si no so inscididas no pujara le sanc de tot.	If the artery is subtle, then you wrap it at the tip of a needle, and then cut off a portion according to the amount by which its ends are extended and are contracted, without creating a flow of blood; for if they are not cut, the blood pressure will not rise.
E aprop evacua del sanc de vi unc. entro a tres.	And then drain the blood from the vein once. Inside three times.
E si la arceria es gran, lahoras cove que tu lies aquela en dos locs am fiel dopble fort de ceda o am cordas a lonc, e no coyte a lu putrefaccio denant la consolidacio de la plagua e endevengua flux de sanc.	And if the nerve is large, then you divide it into two areas at each of its ends with double strength thread or with strings long, and do not let it decompose in front of the healing of the wound, expecting a flow of blood.
E aprop incideys la superfluitat la qual es entre dos liamentz; e fay aquo en aquela hora o aprop autra ora.	And then cut off the excess that is between two pieces; do this to it immediately or later.
E si vols, cauteriza aquela am cauteri entro al os am cauteri cutellar entro que sian incididas las extramitatz de lu, e stara en loc de aquela meteyssa obra.	And if you want, cauterize that with a cautery inside the hole made by the cautery knife until its ends are incised; it will stay in the place of that half-done job.
E es milhor obra sino que·l malaute aia febre o es de escalfada compleccio; quar cauteri es de aquelas causas que ajudan a las humiditatz finidoras, e donc es milhor en juvament.	And it is better work if the patient has fever or shows signs of coldness; because cautery comes from those causes that help in finishing off moisture, and thus it is better for young people.
E cove aprop la extraccio de las arcerias que huomplas le loc de coto antic, e sian pausatz sobre lu polvils decentement fayt, e aprop sia curat am medicinas seccas fazen naysser la carn e am calguas entro que sia sanat.	And cut off the extraction of nerves that you place at the ancient site, and have them lie on your clean dust decently, then treat with dry medicines let the flesh come out and heat in order to heal.
E si mentre obres autra veguada endeventa flux de sanc de la arceria, lahora tu te coyta a restrenger aquel sanc, o am cauteri, o que omplas le loc de coto, e strenh la tua ma entro que sia restreyt le sanc.	And if while you work another wound appears with blood flowing from the nerve, then you must restrict that blood flow, or with a cautery, or fill the site of the old injury, and press your hand until the bleeding is restricted.
E si deguna causa de aquelas no es a tu present, lahoras pausa le tieu dit sobre le loc entro que·l sanc sia congilat, e enbroca le loc am aygua de vehement fregiditat entro que la acuitat repausa, e sia strengut segon que cove.	And if none of those causes are present, then hold your hand on the spot until the bleeding is congealed, and cover the area with cold water to cool down until it calms, strengthening according as you can.
E aquo que es pus leugier en extraccio de arceria es que tu cauterizes la vena am aquest cauteri haventz dos cotels, pus que tu has senhat les dos locs am tenta, e depausa quascus, mot ignitz, entro que pervenguan al os e inscindan la vena en dos locs, per so que sia elonguat aquo que es entre las extremitatz de lu, quar no son consolidadas de tot am aquest cauteri.	And that which is easier in the extraction of nerves is to cauterize the vein with this cautery having two knives, because you have touched both spots on the test, and then blow fire until they reach the hole and divide the vein into two spots, so that it becomes extended where its ends are, but do not let them become solid with all this cautery.
E aquesta es la forma del cauteri:	And this is the shape of the cautery:
E sia la acuitat dels dos cotels esemps.	And let the heat of the two knives be equal.
Mays empero si so mendres acuitat que dos cotels es milhor, quar si so agudas cum dos cotels propera a quascuna freg, e no enscideysso la carn am velocitat.	However, if the heat of the two knives is greater than that of two knives, then it is better, for if they are sharp like two knives close to each other and do not cut the flesh at speed.
Donc cum en aquels es alcuna grossitut, es tenguda la calor del foc en aquels e la carn es abscindida leugierament.	Therefore, whenever there is a thickness in those, the heat of the fire in those and the flesh is cut slightly.
E aquesta obra es milhor en tota obra e pus leugiera.	And this work is better in all works and much lighter.
E sia le spazi le qual es entre dos cotels la quantitat de la grossesa del dit.	And let the space which is between the two knives be the size of the thickness of that instrument.
Capitol quart.	Chapter IV.
De la cura de cors de lagremas agudas e aciduas dels huels.	On the treatment of noses with sharp and sour tears.
Quan so lagremas aciduas, e es le cors de aquelas venas las quals so sobre le test del cap deforo, e no comfereys en aquo alcuna causa de la curacio de medicina, e vezes la cara del malaute ja enrogesir e sent en le sieu front deambulacio ayssi cum si era deambulacio de formiguas, e·ls huels de aquel so extenuatz, humitz enayssi que ja les pels de lor son conodutz, e las parpelas so scalfadas per la acuitat de las lacrimas, les antics agro mesties en la curacio de aquelas de aquesta operacio, e nompnero aquela curacio am spassa.	When there are sour tears, and it is the body of those veins that are on the forehead in front, and no cause is found for the treatment according to medicine, then you have the patient's face already reddened, moving around as if it were a dance of mosquitoes, their noses exhausted, wet like they're already known by their skin texture, and their eyelids are scratched from the sharpness of the tears, the old ones are in favor of this kind of treatment, and they prefer this treatment to passiveness.
E es que tu comandas al malaute rayre les pels les quals son en le sieu front, e aprop inscideys en le front tres fissuras engualment distans segon la longitut del front.	And it is that you order the patient to rub their forehead's skin and then cut into the forehead three equal gaps according to the length of the forehead.
E si’ la longitut de la fissura cays dos ditz: la una fissura sia engualment distant a la longitut del nas en le mieg loc del front, e la segonda segon la longitut un petit del movement dels lacertz les quals so en le lacrimal, e la tersa del autre part.	And if the length of the gap is two fingers: one gap shall be equally distant from the length of the nose in the middle of the forehead, and the second according to the length of a little bit of movement of the tear glands which are in the lacrimal, and the third on the other side.
E guarda te de la incizio de las arcerias las quals so en dos latz, e elongua la tua ma de la continuacio de amdos las mandibulas.	And protect yourself from the beginning of the arteries which are in two sides, and extend your hand along both the continuation of the jaws.
E si’ l’espazi de quascuna inscizio la quantitat de tres ditz ajustatz.	And if it's about any initial space make sure to adjust its quantity to three fingers.
E si’ a tu una pessa d’espongua apparelhada o draps seccatz motz am les quals exsiccas le sanc.	And if you have a sponge or damp cloth, place them under where the pain is drying out.
E aprop entremet le spatum de dos agudas extremitatz, del qual aquesta es la forma de la inscisio de lu:	And place two sharp points at each extremity, which is the shape of the incision for them:
que es de la partida des templas entro a la segonda inscizio.	that begins from dividing the warmth into the second incision.
Exxcorja am aquel tota la codena la qual es entre dos incizios am le ciphac le qual es sobre le os, e aprop fay aquo de la inscizio migera entro a la segonda inscisio.	Scour that entire series which is between the two incisions near the joint which is above the bone, and do this for the incision to move into the second incision.
E aprop stratz ne aquest spatum e entromet en la primieyra inscizio autra vetz un autre instrument le qual es apelat cutellar, agut de una part e del autre no agut.	And remove this incision and insert another instrument in the first incision, it is called a knife, sharp on one side and not so sharp on the other.
E pausa le latz de aquel agut deves la carn annexa deves la codena, e le latz de lu leon dintz le os, e empelley aquel entro que pervengua a la fissura migera, e abscindeys am aquel totz les vaysels que descendo del cap als huels.	And place the sharp part of this you should cut off the attached flesh and that series, and the other end in his bone inside the bone, and put this one into it so that it reaches the middle opening, and cut all the vessels that descend from the head to the organs.
Mays que sia continuada la inscizio ad aquo appar de la codena, e aprop fay aquo en la fissura migana entro al autra fissura.	May the incision continue until it reaches that part of the series, and do this in the middle opening between the other opening.
E pus que corr del sanc quantitat engual, exprem les locs de las pessas del sanc congilat.	And once a quantity of sweat from the pain has flowed out, squeeze the places of the accumulated sweat on the wound.
E aprop pausa en quascuna fissura calgua de coto vielh, e pausa sobre aquels polvils enbegutz en vi e oli e vi agre, e vegas que no endevengua apostema caut.	And place near each opening of the old cut, and apply over those powders mixed in vinegar and oil and wine, and make sure not to allow pus to appear.
E en le tertz dia deslia le liament e aministra gran enfusio de aygua cauda o tebeza, e aprop cura aquo am enguent bazilicon am oli rozat e autres entro que las plaguas sian sanadas.	And on the third day loosen the ligament and administer large doses of hot water or sweat baths, and apply this with basil oil among other things so that the wounds are healed.
Capitol .v.	Capital .v.
De la cura de lagramas per catartz e als huels descendentz de las partidas dedintz del cap.	Regarding the treatment of gout and descending organs from the parts inside the head.
Quan ad alcu veno catartz agutz e continuantz, e vezes les huels del malaute extenuatz petitz, e ja le reguardament de lor es debelitat, e las palpebras ulceradas e de lor cazo les pels, e en le preon del cap es dolor aguda ledent e extrenutacio consequent, lahoras sapias per aquestz accidentz que las materias e catartz no veno sino de motas venas de las partidas dedintz procedent.	When in some vein there is gout and continuing it, and sometimes the organs descending from the thigh are exhausted, and their examination has deteriorated, and the eyelids are ulcerated along with their skin, and at the back of the head is intense pain and subsequent exhaustion, then you should be aware of these incidents where the substances and gout do not come from veins of the parts that proceed internally.
E la milhor curacio en aquels es aquesta: que comandes al malaute que raza lo sieu front, e aprop inscideys en aquel una fissura al mieg loc del front, un petit per la latitut (e comensa am la fissura del templar senestre entro al dextre templar; e sia inscisio entro al os; e eslongua la tua ma dels lacertz del templas lesquals son maugutz deves la mastigacio), entro que sia le os descubert.	And the best treatment for this is this: order the thigh to scratch its forehead, and then make an incision in that at the middle of the forehead area, a small one according to width (and start from the opening behind the left temple towards the right temple; and the incision goes inside the bone; and extend your hand along the bumps of the temples which are swollen due to chewing), into where the bone is exposed.
Exsicca tot le sanc am espongua o am drap secc e aprop repleys entre las doas labias de la fissura am coto vielh o am draps de li.	Dry all the sweat with a cloth or on linen and then fill between the two edges of the incision with old cloth or on linens.
E aprop estrenh desus am polvils enbegutz en vi e oli per so que no endevengua apostema caut.	And strengthen it from above with powders mixed in vinegar and oil so that no pus appears.
E quan deslias aquo e veses que l’apostema ja es diminuit, lahoras cove que fregua le os entro que comensa en lu nayser carn, e aprop cura aquel am regiment exsiccatiu le qual fassa neysser la carn, ayssi cum si tu prenes de farina de froment dos partidas e de colofania quatre partidas e mescla o, e de lor sia fayt emplastre e sia aministrat en aquestas plaguas a de la carn nativitat.	And when you relieve this and several times as the pus has diminished, then cover the bone starting from your belly flesh, and treat this with regenerative drying that makes flesh boil like if you took two parts of wheat flour and four parts of honeycomb and mixed them together, and make a plaster from it and apply it in these wounds to resemble original flesh.
Capitol .vi.	Capitol .vi.
De la cura de aquo que catz en las aurelhas.	Regarding the treatment of gout that affects the ears.
Tota causa que catz en las aurelhas es una de quatre specias, quar o es peyra mineral o causa semblant a peyra, ayssi cum ferr e veyre, o es de planta ayssi cum ceze o fava, o es causa fluxtibla ayssi cum aygua e vi agre e a lor semblantz, o alcuna bestia.	All the causes of gout in the ears are one of four types, or it is like gravel due to a mineral cause, such as iron and lead, or plant-based like clove or broad beans, or it is a fluid-like cause like water and wine together and similar to them, or some animal.
E donc quan peyra catz en l’aurelha o autra causa semblant de aquelas causas que no ajustan ne creysso en l’aurelha, e pausa la aurelha al solelh, e si vezes la peyra, lahoras distilla en aquela alcuna causa de oli violat o sizami, e aprop aministra la extraccio de lu, e fay le stornudar am condizi, e oppila las nars deve le aveniment de stornutacio.	And when gravel is in the ear or other similar causes from those that do not settle or swell in the ear, place the ear to the sun's heat, and if you see the gravel, then distill with some oily substance or saffron, and administer the removal of this, and make it sneeze in the condition, and keep your nose away from the occurrence of sneezing.
E aprop pausa en le circuit de la aurelha alscunas pessas de drap o lana, e dextendas la aurelha a las partidas desus, quar motas veguadas es foro-getada am aquestas causas.	And place some pieces of cloth or wool around the ear, and stretch the ear upwards to the parts above it, which swollen spots are exposed from these causes.
E si no n’es getada, lahoras aministra extraccio de lu am le instrument apelat gesti epicicarios subtil del qual aquesta es la forma:	And if it is not affected, then administer removal of this with the instrument called a small ear syringe, which has this form:
E si es foro-getada am gesti, bo es; e sino, lahoras aministra la extraccio de lu am onci subtil de pauca duplicacio.	And if it is blocked by the syringe, then yes, that's fine; otherwise, then administer the removal of this with a slender tube made of copper.
E donc si no es foro-getada per aquo, lahoras fay una canula de aram e entromet la extremitat de la canula en le trauc de la aurelha e claus a l’enviro de la canula am cera e am oli mollificada per so que no sia ubert sino la canula.	And if it is not blocked by this, then make a tube of reed and insert the end of the tube into the ear canal and coat the surroundings of the tube with wax and softened oil so that there is only opening to the tube.
E aprop extratz am le tieu vent am fort atraccio, quar tropas veguadas cum aquo que havem recontat.	And then extract forcefully from your nostril with strong suction, which produces swollen areas like what we have described.
Mays si no es foro-getada en aquesta manieyra, lahoras pren de halka alumbat o de vecz aparelhat am le qual son preses les ausels una patita quantitat, e pausa aquel en la extremitat de ray, e aprop envolopa sobre aquel coto decentment pausat.	And if it is not blocked in this manner, then take some powdered chalk or ground almonds with which you make small balls, and place this at the end of the tube and cover this sufficiently with a cushion.
E aprop entromet aquel en le trauc de la aurelha am facilitat, e aprop excicca la aurelha de la humiditat.	And then intervene in the ear canal for ease, and remove the moisture from the ear.
E donc si no es foro-getada am totas las causas las quals havem recontadas, lahoras tu coyta a talhar aquela denant que endevengua apostema caut o espasme.	And so if none of the causes we have recounted is responsible, then you should prepare to treat that which might lead to a boil or spasm.
E la manieyra de talhar aquela es que tu al comensament sancnes le malaute de la vena sephasica e extratz del sanc segon la mannieyra de la vertut de lu, e aprop fay aquel cezer entre las tuas mas e converteys l’aurelha a las partidas desus, e fen am petita fissura en la razit de la aurelha deves lo greys de lu en le loc be premegut de lu.	And the method of treating that is to start by touching the patient's vein of the phlegmatic blood and remove it according to the manner of its nature, then make that incision between your hands and convert the ear towards the parts above, making a small crack in the base of the ear you should press the pus from him into the place pressed by him.
E sia la fissura de figura lunar entro que pervengua a la peyra, e, la peyra atrobada, osta aquela si podes am instrumentz apropriatz; e aprop cos la fissura en aquela hora am velocitat, e cura aquela entro que sia sanat.	And if the crack has the form of the lunar figure reaching to the skin, and once the skin is torn off, you must keep that if possible with appropriate instruments; and, using speed when working on this while it's happening, treat it so that it becomes healed.
E si la causa cazent en la aurelha es un dels gras que creysso e so inflatz, lahoras aministra la curacio e la extraccio de lu; mays si no obezeys a tu ad eyssiment, lahoras tu pren spatum teune subtil segon aquesta forma:	And if the cause in the ear is one of those growing lumps that inflate, then administer treatment and remove it; but if you cannot withstand the pain, then take a thin needle according to this form:
e aministra am aquel la abscizio de aquel gra lo qual es cazut en l’aurelha.	And perform that extraction of the lump in the ear which is contained.
E no fassas aquo quan cogitas que aquel ja es humectat per la vapor del aurelha, e pausa aquel en motas pessas, e prop extratz ne aquelas am les oncis o am gesti subtil, o ab inscizio ayssi co dit havem, quar es alleujada la extraccio de lu.	And don't do that when you think it's already saturated with the steam of the ear, pause in heavy spots, and then carefully remove them or through gentle pressure on the sides, or with an incision as we have said, so that the removal becomes easier.
Mays en l’aygua la qual es intrada en l’aurelha cove que·l malaute use de sternutacio am condizi al comensament, e omple la sieua aurelha am alcu coto vielh, e jagua sobre aquela aurelha en la qual es l’aygua, e si per aquo es foro-getada, bo es; e sino, lahoras pren tropas peyras teunas e leons segon la longitut del dit, e calfa aquelas en le foc un pauc, e le pacient entrometa una de aquelas en le trauc de la sua aurelha e saute sobre la un pe sieu de aquela partida e percussia am una autra peyra sobre la peyra la qual es dintz la aurelha.	And in the water which has entered into the ear canal, so that the patient sneezes at the beginning and fills their ear with a bit of old cotton, then place this over the ear where there is water, and if through this it becomes open, it's good; otherwise, take thin wooden and iron tools according to its length, and heat these slightly in the flame, and have the patient insert one of these into the entrance of their ear, press against a part of that with another cotton ball and hit it with another cotton ball over the ball which is inside the ear.
Donc no cesse aquo am peyra entro que tota l’aygua sia foro-getada.	Then don't stop this with a cotton ball until all the water has become drained out.
E ja l’aygua sira foro-getada enayssi que tu prenguas de papier o de gonc .i., e met la una extremetat de lu en l’aurelha e estendas l’autre extremitat am foc entro que sia comburit le may de lu.	And once the water has fully drained away, take paper or a glove instead,. and place one end of it in the ear and extend the other end into the flame so that its tip is burned.
E prop met i autre gonc e fay aquo tantas veguadas entro que tota l’aygua sia foro-getada, e stratz aquel am canula ayssi co desus es dit de la peyra extrasadora.	And place another glove and do this as many times until all the water has drained away, and remove it with a cannula like the one used to extract cotton.
Mays en la extraccio de bestia intrant en aquela aurelha, si es a petit cos, ayssi piussa e a lu semblant, cura aquel ayssi cum havem dit en la divisio; mays si es de gran cos la qual causa apar al sen del vezement, lahoras aministra la extraccio de lu am gesti e oncis, e la causa de lu es pus leugiera de totas las autras causas que cazo en l’aurelha.	And in the removal of what enters into that ear, if it is a small one, as big as possible and similar to it, treat it as we have said in the division; but if it is of a large size causing pain deep inside, then administer its removal through gentle pressure and using cotton balls, and this cause is the least among all other causes that occur in the ear.
Mays en la extraccio de verm engendrat en la aurelha, quan tu curas aquel am aquo que havem dit en la divisio e en le tractat de distillacios e no comfereys la tua curacio, lahoras cove que tu reguardes la aurelha al solelh.	And in the removal of worms produced in the ear, when you treat it as we have said in the division and within the treatment of distillations, do not let your treatment fail, then consider observing the ear under sunlight.
E donc si apar aqui alcuna causa dels verms, lahoras extratz aquel am gesti o am onci subtils, mays si no apar deguna causa, lahoras pren una canula dejos streyta e desus ampla de la qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And if any cause of worms appears here, then remove it through gentle pressure or through small cotton balls, but if no cause appears, take a cannula that is stretched out and somewhat wide, which is the shape of this:
E entromet la extremitat subtil en la aurelha segon la quantitat la qual suffertar puesca le malaute; e aprop sucgeys am aquela per succio fort, e fay aquo motas veguadas, entro que totz les verms sian foro-gitatz.	And insert the small end into the ear according to the quantity that can tolerate it by the patient; and then suck out through strong suction, and do this several times, until all worms have drained away.
Mays si no obezeysso a tu al ayssiment, lahoras tu opila e claus en le circuit de la canula am cera ayssi cum havem dit; lahoras aministre distillacios las quals han ja esproadas les antics en la curacio dels verms, e atrobaras aquo en le tractat de distillacios.	And if you cannot withstand the pain, then fill and seal in the cannula circuit with wax as we have said; then administer distilled waters which have already evaporated the old ones in worm treatment, and consult this for further information on distillations.
E sia la tua efusio am la qual efundas les olis medicinas en la aurelha am aquest strument del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And make your application using the oil medicines in the ear with this tool which has this shape:
E fay aquela de argent o de eram, dejos streyt, en le qual sia un petit trauc, e am pla desus.	Make it of silver or wood, stretched out, and on its surface there should be a small opening.
E donc sia cum empellent a que es en la conquavitat de la canula de continent aqui on sira necessari.	And make it so that when used for the canal's cavity as required here, it becomes necessary.
E si vols, pren le ray e envolveys en la extremitat de lu decentment coto, e aprop gieta oli en la concavitat del auziment, o suc de alcuna herba, o aquo que vols de aquestas medicinas en la canula — e aquela es en la aurelha —, e aprop entromet le ray am coto desus e exprem am la tua ma aquel am compressio temprada de lu entro que l’oli sia expellit en la concavitat del auziment e le malaute senta le oli dedintz.	And if you wish, take the rod and wrap it around the descending part of this cotton, then pour oil into the cavity of the horn, or juice from any herb, or whatever you want from these medicines in the cannula — and that is inside the ear — then insert the rod with a little cotton on top and squeeze it using your hand as soon as the oil is expelled into the cavity of the horn and the patient feels the oil internally.
E aquo que sia enfundut en la aurelha sia ja scalfat am foc un petit.	And whatever is inside the ear should already be softened by heat from a small flame.
E guarda te que la causa la qual distillaras en l’aurelha no sia trop frega, quar las medicinas de aurelha no suffertan aquo.	And remember that when you distil in the ear, it should not be too hot, because ear medicines cannot tolerate this.
Capitol .vii.	Chapter VII.
De curacio de opilacio de aurelhas.	On the treatment of wax blockages in the ears.
Alcunas veguadas alcus enfantz yeysso dels ventres de lors mayres no-perforatz, e aquo ja accideys en alcus homes, opilacio en le meat de la aurelha per plagua o per carn nada en aquela; e aquesta opilacio alcunas veguadas es fayta en le preon del trau de la aurelha la qual no consiec le vezement, e alcunas veguadas es en las partidas defora.	Some cases of infants have caused abdominal swelling in their parents that has not been punctured, and this happens sometimes in adults as well, wax blockage in the ear canal by a small rock or a piece of soft flesh in there; and some of these wax blockages occur before the opening of the ear canal which does not reach the inner part, while others are outside the parts.
E aquela que accideys en le preon de lu, la qual no comprehen le vezement, es en las majors disposicios de dificil sanacio.	And that which happens in the beginning of his condition, which cannot be comprehended by mere observation, is in the most difficult treatments for recovery.
E en aquela en qual consegueys le vezement, cove que tu pauses la aurelha del malaute al solelh e reguarda en aquela.	And in that situation where you can see it clearly, take the patient's foot to the sun and observe it.
E donc si vezes oppulacio apparent, obre aquela am espatum subtil del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And if you notice swelling that is visible, open it with a thin blade which has the shape of this:
Si’ la extremitat de lu en la qual sia petita la latitut, del qual la una partida sia aguda e l’autra no; e le spatum sia de dos latz leon per so que no fassa lizio al aurelha.	If the end of it where its breadth is small, having one part sharp and the other not; and the blade be of two lion's lengths each side so that it does not pinch the foot.
E donc si la opilacio es per carn nascuda en la aurelha o en le meat de lu, lahoras te aquela am oncis subtils e incidiys aquela vehement facilitat entro que sia ostada tota la carn.	And if the swelling is in the flesh around the foot or at its ankle, then you have that with very sharp scalpels and penetrate it deeply so that all the flesh is inside.
E si opilacio es en le preon de la aurelha, lahoras pren ray subtil leon e escalfa aquel am foc un pauc, e aprop met aquel en le meat de l’aurelha.	And if the swelling is in the front of the foot, then take a sharp lion's claw and make a small incision with fire, and then place that near the middle of the foot.
E donc si as scentit oppulacio am aquo que le malaute atroba am facilitat, per gravetat de ausir, esforsa la oppressio de lu am facilitat; e guarda te que no plagues les nervis del aurelha.	And if you have felt swelling that causes discomfort in the foot due to pressure, relieve the compression of it with ease; and make sure not to injure the nerves of the foot.
E aprop pausa en l’aurelha drap de li segon la quantitat del ample del trauc lo qual tu as envolvutz en l’enguent egipciac; e fay aquo per alcus jorns entro que sias segur de la consolidacio de la plagua; o que prenguas qualgua e enfon aquela en ayguaros e pulveriza sobre lu segi trissat e usa de lu; e si vezes la aurelha ja esser apostemada, lahoras cove que tu estraguas la qualgua e permutes aquela am autra qualgua la qual tu envoloparas en cerot que sia fayt am oli rozat, entro que sia le apostema caut cedat; e aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And then place a bandage on the foot according to the size of the area that you have enveloped in Egyptian ointment; and do this for several days until you are sure of the healing process; or take something and immerse it in water, crush it over it, and use it; and if you see the swelling has disappeared, then observe that you discard whatever you used and replace it with another one which you envelop in wet cloth made from cotton dipped in rose oil, while waiting for the pus to drain out; and take care of this until it is healed.
Mays si accideys flux de sanc, lahoras submergeys esponga o drap en aygua frega e pausa sobre la aurelha, e usa del autra curacio la qual restrengeys le flux del sanc, la qual es dita en le tractat de distillacio.	And if there is a discharge of pus, then immerse the sponge or cloth in warm water and place it over the foot, and use another treatment that stops the pus discharge, which is mentioned in the distillation treatise.
Capitol .viii.	Title VIII
De cura de athezil le qual endeveno a las palpebras.	Title VIII: On the treatment of atresia which affects the eyelids.
Athezil les quals endeveno a las paupebras dels huels alcuna veguada so humitz, alscunas veguadas son secs.	Atresia affecting the eyelids; some times they are wet, at other times they are dry.
Donc cove que tu tenguas aquels am tenhalhas o am onci, e inscindas aquels am espatum de las suas razitz, e aprop pausa sobre les locs segi trissat.	Then use those with tweezers or forceps, and separate those from their roots, and place them in crushed water over the affected areas.
Mays si dolor am flux de sanc veno, lahoras tu cauteriza aquels am cauteri lanticular subtil.	And if there is pain with pus discharge, then you apply a cautery to those with a subtle limber tip.
E la milhor cauterizacio es aprop las inscizios e tropas veguadas retornam quan reman alcuna causa de sas razitz; e quan so cauterizadas am foc, aquelas razitz son comburidas e no retornan.	And the best application of the cautery is that the incisions and the pus-filled areas return when there remains any cause at their roots; and when they are burned with fire, those roots are destroyed and do not return.
Capitol .ix.	Title IX
Cura de grandeyssa que veno a las palpebras dels huels.	Treatment for granulomas that occur on the eyelids of individuals.
Motas veguadas endeve en las palpebras dels huels alcuna causa la qual es asemblada a grandissa en sa fortalicia e duricia, e per so grandissia es apelada.	Swelling occurs on the eyelids of individuals due to some cause which manifests as a large lump in its firmness and hardness, and because of this lump, it is called granuloma.
E es agreguacio de humiditat grossa en la palpebra dejos e desus.	And it is an addition of large moisture on the eyelid that leaves and above it.
Donc la opperacio en lor es que consideras lahoras si la grandissia es procedent en lu en aquo que apar de la palpebra e es mauguda a tota partida; e la causa de lu es leugiera.	Therefore, in this situation, you should consider it when the lump is proceeding within it from under the eyelid and is hard to all parts; and the cause of it is minor.
Donc fen sobre aquela am fissura per la latitut, e aprop escorga aquela de tota partida am facilitat entro que evasesca, e aprop suspen aquela am onci e abscindeys aquela.	Then make an incision over it for the width, and then carefully probe it from all sides with ease until it drains out, and then lift it with forceps and remove that.
Mays si a tu no es apparelhada la incizio de lu si no pus que penetras la palpebra am inscizio pauc a pauc, lahoras aquo no notz en deguna causa.	And if it is not clear to you whether there is pus or if you do not penetrate the eyelid with small incisions one by one, then this does not signify any cause.
E si la figura es gran, lahoras tu l’ajusta am sutura; e cura aquela entro que sia sanada.	And if the shape is large, then you adjust it with stitches; and take care of that until it heals.
E si es pauca, a tu no sobrevindra mal per aquela quar l’anguent de lu restaura aquela e encarna.	And if it is small, there will not be any harm in that as the warmth of it restores that and causes it to heal.
E si la grandissia es declinant a las partidas dedintz de la palpebra deves la superficia dedintz, lahoras evesa la palpebra e suspen la grandissia am onci, otra que tu indigescas de incizio, e prem aquela de tota part, e si la palpebra per inscizio es alonguada, aquo no notz en deguna causa.	And if the lump declines towards the inner parts of the eyelid, you should remove it from within the surface; then cut open the eyelid and lift out the lump with forceps, or another one that you use for incisions, press it from all sides, and if the eyelid is stretched by incision, this does not signify any cause.
E aprop la incizio, lava le huel am aygua salada; e cura le loc am aquo que encarna entro que sia sanat.	And near the incision, wash the eye with salty water; and take care of that area until it heals.
Capitol .x.	Title X
De la cura axcirnah en la palpebra desus del huel.	Title X: On the treatment of excoriation on the eyelid above the eye.
Axcirnath es grays le qual es engendrat en las tunicas de la palpebra desus, e majorment endeve als enfantz, agrava les huels de aquels et accideyso a lor catartz le mayti; e no podon reguardar la claror del solelh per aquo quar lagremas se coytan ad aquels.	Excoriation is a greyish condition that arises in the tissues of the eyelid above, and more so for children, it intensifies their tears leading to blurred vision; thus they cannot see the brightness of sunlight due to the tearing up of their eyes.
E per so tu vezes aquels jaser sobre les lors caras tot temps, e sobre les lors caras dormen; e so a las palpebras de lor dejos les sobrecils humidas, las quals ja ha cuberta imflacio, e iminencia de accernac apparent es en l’uelh; e que quant tu premes le loc am les tieus ditz, tu centes accernac entro aquels.	And you often use those to rub on their faces continuously, and sleep with them on their faces; and on the eyelids of them, they have wet eyebrows which are already covered by swelling and the apparent tendency for excoriation is in the eyes; and when you press that area with your fingers, you hear scratching sounds coming from those.
E alcuna manieyra de opperacio es en aquel que le malaute pausa le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop pausa drap de li e de lu fay calgua, e fay de lu cercle segon la quantitat la qual contena arthernach de tota partida, e aprop pausa aquel sobre aquela e prem am les tieus ditz de tota per que sia agreguat arcernac en le mieg del cercle, e aprop fen en le mieg de aquela humiditat am spatum inscident am fissura per la latitut, e la fissura no sia major que la fissura que es fayta en flaubotomia.	And one way of treatment is that the foot rests its head on your finger, then place a cloth under it and apply butter oil, make a circle according to the quantity which contains pus from all parts, then place this over that area and press with your fingers from all sides so that scratching sound accumulates in the middle of the circle. Then at the center of that moisture, make an incision for width, and the incision should not be larger than the one made in a lymph node excision.
Mays en le preon cove que tu fendas la codena tota entro que pervenguas ad arcernach, quar en las mays desposicios proceseys arcernach per fissura segon la forma de grayseza blanca.	When you are in the preparatory phase for cutting open the abdomen, you must completely cut it throughout where you reach the navel. Afterward, in the later positions during surgery, proceed to make a cut through the wound following the shape of white fatty tissue.
Donc extratz aquela am draps los quals tu as envolopatz entre les tieus ditz a las partidas deforo e revolv entre la ma dextra e sinistre entro que sia dispargut.	So extract those in the sheets which you have enveloped between your fingers towards the parts outside, and rotate with your right and left hand until they are dispersed.
E guarda te que no ajustes en la fissura per so que am le spatum no pervenguas al huel e ladescas aquel.	And remember not to tighten in the wound so that blood does not accumulate and cause discomfort there.
Mays si no apar a tu arternach en le comensament de la fissura, mays que tu ajustes en la fissura un petit am fecilitat entro que procesisca arternach; e aprop extratz aquela ayssi quo havem dit; e aprop submargeys draps de li en aygua e vi agre e pausa les sobre le loc e estrenh aquels am polvils.	When it is not at your will in the beginning of cutting through the wound, then adjust in the wound a little aid so that you can proceed with cutting; and further extract that which we have said; and further submerge cloths for him in water and wine and spread them over the area, pause those on the spot and strengthen those with powders.
E so alcus que trissan sal e pausan aquel en la conquavitat de la fissura per so que aquo que es remas de aquela humiditat.	And thus that they sprinkle salt and pause that in the cavity of the wound so that what is soaked with that moisture.
E aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And further, treat it until it heals.
Mays si accideys en le loc apostema caut, lahoras cura aquel am emplastres cedatils entro que sia sanat.	So if an abscess occurs in the spot, then treat it with plaster bandages until it heals.
Capitol .xi.	Chapter xi.
De manieyras de tactimi del huel.	On methods of bleeding.
Quan en las palpebras dels huels so natz pels ajustatz dejos les pels naturals e so antiquatz, lahoras aquels noso al huel e fan endevenir manieras de malautias ayssi cum lacrimas assiduas e mollificacio de palpebras e tela entro que aquo sia causa de destruccio del huel que s’apela tactinir del huel, e cura se en quatre manieyras: o per cauteri am foc; o am medicina acuta segon que denant es dit en le capitol de cauteri; o es fayt atactini per inscizio e sutura; o per cannas segon que yeu diyre.	When in the eyelids of the eyes there are natural warts and they have become old, then these cause harm to the eyes leading to conditions like frequent tears and inflammation of the eyelids and inner eye area which is known as bleeding of the eye (tactinir del huel). Treatment for this can be done in four ways: through cautery with fire; or by using acute medicine as mentioned earlier in the section on cautery; or it can be treated with bleeding without cautery through incision and suture; or through needles according to what I am saying.
E donc cove que tu pauses le cap del malaute en le tieu se; aprop converteys la palpebra del uelh am la tua ma sinistra, e si es convertida, bo es; e sino, entromet agulha en aquela en la qual sia fiel de la partida pus dejos de la palpebra, e fay penetrar la agulha am fiel desus, e aquo sia — prop del marge de la palpebra en le qual naysso les pels — prop dels pels, e tira le fiel a las partidas desus am la palpebra, e converteys aquela am le ray.	And when you make the cut to place your finger at the eye level; then turn the eyelid of the eye with your left hand, and if it is turned, then yes; and if not, insert a needle into that part where pus is present under the eyelid, and let the needle penetrate through this point above. And thus, near the margin of the eyelid in which warts appear, near the warts, pull out the thread from the parts above on the eyelid, and turn it back to its original position.
E aprop fen en la partida dedintz de la palpebra dejos les pels ajustatz am spatum inscidentz del lacrimal major entro al lacrimal mendre; e aprop extratz le fiel e pausa dejos la palpebra polvilhs petitz de coto o de drap, e aprop senha sobre la palpebra am tenta, e sia ayssi cum figura de fuelha de mirt.	And afterwards, you make the cut in the inner part of the eyelid with the warts aligned towards the major lacrimal ducts at the level of the lacrimal sac; then remove the thread and spread a petal or sheet powder on the eyelid. Apply this to the eyelid tentatively until it looks like a mirethron leaf.
Mays empero cove que sia la figura segon la quantitat de helevacio de la palpebra, quar aquo ja es diversificat en les homes, quar de aquels es le quals indigeys que sia inscidit de la palpebra gran quantitat segon la quantitat per la qual la palpebra es mollificada.	But when you make the cut, according to the amount of deflation of the eyelid, which has already diversified in humans, those who are such that they bleed excessively from the eyelid according to the amount for which the eyelid becomes softened.
E aprop fen am le spatum sobre las doas linhas las quals has senhadas, e comensa del lacrimal major entro al lacrimal menor.	And afterwards you apply it over the two lines where you have marked, starting from the major lacrimal to the minor lacrimal.
E si’ la tua fissura prop dels pels naturals ayssi cum es la grossetut del rey.	And if your cut is close to the natural skin, as in the thickness of a king's throne.
E aprop met le onci en un dels dos angles de la codena, e aprop excoria aquela tota, e aprop ajusta am la scitura las doas labias am gula o fiel de lana subtil, e abstergeys le sanc, e fay adherir aquo que superflueys dels fiels sobre dos sobrecils am alcunas causas enviscans, si voles far aquo, e sino, non cures.	And then place the needle in one of the two corners of the abdomen, and thoroughly scrape that area. Then adjust it according to the stitches, both lips towards the stomach or on a thin thread under the needle, clean away any pus, and let stick whatever excess is from the threads over two eyebrows with some causes of irritation if you want to do this; otherwise, do not treat it.
E aprop leyssa la sutura dels fiels entro a tres dias o quatre, e aprop cura aquo.	And after that, examine the stitches of the threads three days or four, and then treat accordingly.
E si vols, layssa la plagua ses sutura, e cura aquela am aquo que exsicca e constrenh, quar la palpebra es alevada deves la sigillacio de la plagua e la agreguacio de lu; mays sutura es milor E donc aysso diysso les antics de taxanir.	And if you wish, let the wound and its stitches heal naturally, treat it with things that dry and constrict, so that the eyelid is elevated, you should seal the wound and add to him; yet stitches are better. Thus always do as the ancients taught.
Mays empero en lu sia sollicitut sobre le malaute, e es de bona operacio, e no es en lu temor.	But regarding this matter in him about the eye, it is a good operation, and not out of fear.
E es autra manieyra en taxmir, e es que senhes sobre la palpebra figura ayssi cum fuelha de mirt, e aprop eleva la palpebra am tres uncis segreguatz e congreguatz segon aquesta forma:	And there is another method for confirmation, and it involves marking on the eyelid in such a way that it resembles a mirethron leaf, and then raising the eyelid by three fingers laid out consecutively according to this form:
Mays si no es possible aquo, tener les uncis, e aquo no es engualhat, lahoras pren una agula en la qual haia fil e met aquela en le mieg de la figura, e entromet le autre fiel prop le lacrimal major, e·l fiel segon prop le lacrimal mendre, e ajusta entre les tieus ditz les fiels am equalitat, e aprop am aquels eleva la tua ma am elevacio engual, eleva tota la codena sobre la qual es senhat ayssi cum havem recomtat.	If it is not possible to do this way, hold the nails, and if this is unequal, then take an awl in which there is a thread and insert that into the middle of the figure, and place the other needle near the major lacrimal duct, and the second needle near the minor lacrimal duct. Adjust between your fingers the needles equally, and next to those raise your hand as high as possible equal to them, lift up the entire string over which the pain is felt just like we have recounted.
E aprop ajusta las doas labias de la plagua am sutura, e cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And adjust the two edges of the wound for suture, and treat that which is being healed so it becomes healthy.
Mays si accideys apostema deves la tua inscizio o la tua fissura, seda aquel apostema am cerot e a lu semblantz, e am enguentz.	If an abscess occurs, you should start with your incision or your cut; but treat that abscess with bandages and make it resemble yours, and apply the ointment.
E alcunas veguadas endeve a la palpebra que·ls sieus pels sian convertitz, adonc cove que tu uses en aquela de aquo que havem dit de inscizio; mays sutura en quascus es mays artificial.	And some cuts under the eyelid where their hairs have to be removed, then take care that you use in that the one we said for incision; but sew with what is more artificial on those that are more so.
Ataxinir am cannas es segon aquesta forma:	Remove the canals like this:
e es que tu convertas la palpebra e scindas la figura qu’es dedintz segon que he recontat; e aprop per art fay doas cannas o doas astelas subtils de las quals longitut sia segon la longitut de la palpebra e la latitut de lor sia mendra de la latitut del spatum.	And this is how you convert the eyelid and divide the figure inside as I recounted; next perform with skill two canals or two subtle stars of which length will be according to the length of the eyelid, and their width slightly less than the width of the nose.
E tu ja has inscidit en las extremitatz de quascunas partidas, la on tenes les fils.	And you have already incised at the extremities of each part, where you have the threads.
Aprop agregua quascuna am subtilitat subre aquo que superflueys de la palpebra del huel, e constres las cannas de quascunas partidas am fort strictura, e layssa aquela per alcus jorns, quar la codena per la strictura morira e sira denegada e se poyrira entro que per si meteyssa cayra.	And add with subtlety under what is superfluous of the eyelid of the dog, and tighten the threads of each part firmly, and let that area rest for a few days; so that through the tightening the thread will die and be rejected, and it will fall into place when it does so naturally.
Mays si es tardat, lahoras trenca la am las toroyras, e aprop cura la plagua entro que sia sanat.	If it is delayed, then break the threads at the sutures, and treat that wound so it becomes healthy.
Donc cum es solidada, la palpebra es elevada e les pels no pungo.	So when it has become solid, the eyelid is lifted and the hairs do not poke.
E aquesta es la forma de doas cannas las quals faras segon aquesta forma:	And this is how you perform two canals which you will do according to this method:
e haia la quantitat de la longitut e de la latitut ni mays ni mens.	and let the quantity of length and width neither exceed nor fall short.
Capitol .xii.	Chapter XII.
De elevacio de pels pungentz en le huel am agula quan le pel es dur.	For the removal of painful hairs in the dog with an awl when the hair is hard.
Quan son pels no-naturals, durs e aspres e pungentz les huels, lahoras la operacio en lu es que tu prenguas agula subtil e pauses en aquela fiel de ceda subtil e leon, e aprop que tu ajustes las extremitatz de lu e nozes quascu en manieyra mot subtil.	When the hairs are unnatural, hard and prickly on the dog's body, then in this operation you should take a subtle awl and place it at that point of this subtle needle and lion. And next, when adjusting the ends of it, press them with dexterity in a delicate manner.
E sia la longitut dels fiels de quantitat de una palma.	And let the length of the needles be as long as your palm.
E aprop tu compon2 autre fiel subtil dejos lu en breu, e nuza las extremitatz de aquel si tu·t vols.	And then you prepare another subtle needle under it quickly, and if you want, press the ends of that too.
E aprop pause le malaute le sieu cap en le tieu se, e sia prop del solelh per que la tua obra sia declarada, quar es operacio subtil e menuda.	And then place the dog's head in your lap and near the sun so that your work is shown clearly, for it is a subtle and small operation.

E aprop tire le pel entro desus e intromet aquel en alixati, e sian les pels un o dos o tres e no mays.	And then pull the hair inwards and insert it until it's tight, and let the hairs be one or two or three but not more.
E aprop tira la tua ma am aquel entro que·l pel sia fora-gitat am alixolati en la palpebra am le pel natural.	And then pull your hand into that until the hair is pulled out tightly inside the eyelid through the opening made by the natural hair.
Mays si es atirat alixalati e non es gitat le pel, atiraras alixati a las partidas dejos am le fiel le qual tu has compost am aquela, entro qu’en sia gitat alixalati del trau sobira.	If it has been pulled out tightly and the hair is not gone, pull tightly on those parts with the needle you made for that until beyond the tight pull from the tool.
E vegas aquela am la visio del huel, quar lahoras tu gitaras alixati e lo fiel, e grotan quascu e clautz le huel, e laysse le claus per dos dias o tres, entro que·l pel adheresca al sieu loc e nasque sobre aquel bona carn.	And then remove that with the dog's view, so hereafter you will pull it tightly and the needle, and shave all and clean its body, and let the skin rest for two or three days, so that the hair adheres to its place and grows back good flesh.
E si es mays breu le pel, lahoras tu ajusta un pel lonc dels pels naturals, e es elevat am aquel, o que·l leysses entro que sia alonguat aprop alcu spazi, e lehoras tu eleva aquel.	And if the hair is shorter than the natural hairs, then adjust a long hair from the natural ones, and lift it up to that, or leave it so that it grows about some space further on, and then lift it.
Capitol .xiii.	Chapter XIII.
De la cura de ehacratir la qual ve en la palpebra desus.	For the treatment of excretion which occurs above the eyelid.
Quan ve en le huel ehacratir, e es contraccio de la palpebra quan es contrayta en sus, o a dextra o a sinistra partida, per mala consolidacio de plagua o de seccio o de cauteri, e es apelada leporina, e aquesta ahercrati o es natural o accidental, e es fayta per consolidacio de plagua o de seccios o de cauteri, o per semblantz a lor malcuratz.	When excretion occurs in the dog, it is the contraction of the eyelid when it tightens at its edges or on the right or left side, due to improper healing or scarring or from a cautery burn. It's called porcupine-like, and this excretion can be natural or accidental; it happens due to proper healing or scarring or from burns resembling them.
May la manieyra de la operacio en lu es que tu fendas aquela consolidacio e que separes las labias de lu, e pauses en lu en aquo que es entre aquelas una meca de drap de li, e ligues aquelas entro que sian sanadas.	The method of the operation in this case is that you should cut through that contraction and separate those parts from it, then place a piece of lint fabric between them, and bind those so they heal.
E no cove que tu uses de curacio de lu de las causas las quals exsiccan, constrenho; quar si tu fas aquo retorna alixacratir pus mal que nulh temps no foc habantz.	And do not cover where you use the healing treatment from the causes that dry out, it must be tight; so if you do this, excretion will be worse than nothing for any amount of time.
Usa en aquela de causas que mollifico ayssi cum es fenugrec, e embroca am la aygua en la qual son coytz altea e semensa de li, o enguent dyaquilon, le qual sia liquefayt am alcu dels olis, e submergeys en aquel la meca, e cura am aquel.	Use from those causes that moisten in such a way as fennel, and soak it in the water with finely chopped it or oil of castor, which should be mixed with some of the oil, then soak the lint fabric in this, and treat it.
E lo tesaur de la tua curacio es que tu perforsses am tot engen que no sia consolidat segon la forma que foc al comensament.	And your treasure in your treatment is to pierce through all that is not yet hardened according to the shape I will describe at the beginning.
E aquesta operacio la qual havem dita, no es sino alcuna rectificacio de ehalixacrati que no retorna la forma del loc segon que foc denant.	This operation which we have described is merely a correction of the hernia that does not return to its original form according to how it was before.
Capitol .xiiii.	Capitol Chapter XIV.
De la cura de ehacrati le qual es fayt en la palpebra dejos.	On the treatment of hernias which are performed in the eyelid, let us proceed.
Aquesta alxacrati la qual es fayta en la palpebra dejos, la qual es nompnada vertadierament alxacrati; e es de lu alcuna natural, autra accidental.	This hernia which occurs in the eyelid, called vertically herniated hernia; it is of two kinds, one natural, the other accidental.
Mays accidental es fayta per plagua o per scissura o per cauteri o per autres semblantz.	The accidental one is caused by injury, cut, cautery or other similar occurrences.
E la via de la operacio de lu es que tu prenguas una agula en la qual haga fil doble, e fiques aquela en la carn, e que la fassas passar del lacrimal de senestre entro al lacrimal dextre, entro que·l fil pervengua en las doas extremitatz de la carn. E sian las extremitatz de las doas fissuras de dos angles de la inscizio, la qual has fayta entro que concurren, e sia de lor fayt angle entro que quan se congreguan sia fayta figura de lor. E aquesta figura es letra greca: la landa.	And this figure is the Greek letter: the lambda.

E aprop separa am la calgua entre doas labias segon que havem dit.	And afterwards, separate with a bath between two lips as we have said.

In the sum of the speech on treating hernias above or below, let the operation flow according to its form in your hands, and that is in the shape of different masses.

And all skilled artisans always prepare tools in every way that is possible for them to return the shape to its natural form, or close enough to it, and according to what suits you from the operation and the instruments among their best arrangements.
Capitol .xv.	Capitol Chapter XV.

Capitol .xvi.	Capitol Chapter XVI.
De inscizio de ungla e de eminencia de carn dels lacrimals.	On cutting the tear duct and elevation of flesh of the lacrimal areas.
Sapias que ungla es segon dos manieyras, quar o es nervosa, e es semblant a ciphac dur subtil; o es no-nervosa, semblant a humiditat blanca congilada, la qual quan ferr la toca, o es forsat aquela prendre am onci, es abscindida e le onci no es ficat en lu. am subtilitat.	with subtlety.

De inscizio de alguazardenic e de aquo que es nascut de carn ajustada en le huel.	Regarding the incision of a hernia and what is born from flesh pressed into the cleft.

Capitol .xviii.	Chapter XVIII.
De colleccio de sabel en le huel.	Regarding the collection in the cleft.

Sabel refers to those tough veins that are found in the cleft and prevent you from performing surgery on them; they allow the cleft to heal over a period of days.
